fields.name: Greater Stealth Totem (Trinket)
fields.description: Limited to 1 Trinket. *Level 9+ required to upgrade. UNIQUE Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible ward that reveals the surrounding area for 180 seconds. Stores a charge every 60 seconds, up to 2 total. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
